631610.name: ICARUS.1 - PROTOTYPE EDITION
631610.description:
Venture on-board an abandoned mining station to loot your way to fame and fortune. Things aren't what they seem and soon what should have been a routine scavenging mission turns into a fight for survival.

Provided as is, experience the chunky prototype version of ICARUS.1. Created in 3 months for the Edge get into Games contest 2015, the game play provides a faster pace and sometimes punishing completion!
631610.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
